name: Idle Game Tycoon
description:
Make code, make games, get rich and expand your workforce.

At first it'll take a while... then you'll upgrade your skills and/or upgrade your work force and rule the world with your games. 

Please give us feed back on bugs and/or your ideas.

Even though this game is free, please give us a donations to help us grow to make better content.

EVERY DONATION OVER 5 DOLLARS AUD THAT PERSON WILL BE PUT INTO THE BACK PAGE OF OUR GAME AND YOUTUBERS WHO POST ABOUT THE GAME GET PUT INTO THE YOUTUBE SECTION!!!!!

Thanks

- One of the CEO's of RedFish Studios
